verses.roman:
mora lāgi' strī-putra-gṛhādi chāḍiyā
nānā durgama patha laṅghi' āisena dhāñā

synonyms: mora lāgi'-for Me; strī—wife; putra—sons; gṛha-ādi—home and so on; chāḍiyā—leaving aside; nānā—various; durgama—difficult; patha—paths; laṅghi'-crossing; āisena dhāñā—come here with great haste.
translation: "All My devotees come here just for Me. Leaving aside their homes and families, they travel by very difficult paths to come here in great haste.
